GeneralInfo.Name: Maroš Beťko
GeneralInfo.Headline: iOS App Developer at Master App
GeneralInfo.Summary: I'm studying Informatics and Design on Masaryk University in Brno. Currently looking for any freelance work connected to C++ or game development. Game development is one of my biggest passions. In my free time I try to develop my skills in this field, ranging from coding to art development. I have an ongoing game project that I like to develop and expand, and try new ideas on. I like challenges that require creative thinking and solving them inspires and motivates me. I'm thorough and organized and hate shoddy quality work and that is what I want my work to reflect.
